name: Hank: Drowning On Dry Land
description:
"Let me bring you up to speed. First of all, I’ve got your friend. Secondly, I’ve strapped your friend to a very large bomb. Thirdly, you can deactivate the bomb. Do it before time runs out and you’ll save not only him, but also yourself. Now get to it! Time’s ticking!"

Hank: Drowning On Dry Land is a time-traveling game in which you play as Hank - a Batman-esque vigilante fighting a sadistic mastermind calling himself The Unraveler.



In order to save the day and outsmart the infamous villain, Hank will have to jump in time, not once but multiple times. With each time jump, he will create another version of himself. When he reaches a point where there are many versions of Hank from many distinctive timelines running around who is to tell, which one is the real? And at the same time, who is the player taking control of the superhero?

Project Co-founded by:
